    • Constructor Detail

      • ParserIntronExon

        public ParserIntronExon(String intron,
                        String exon)
        A Parser which uses simple intron / exon string to delimit comments.

        Comment blocks will be parsed using the following regex: 

         Pattern.quote(intron) + "(.*?)" + Pattern.quote(exon)

      • ParserIntronExon

        public ParserIntronExon(String intron,
                        String exon,
                        String regex)
        A Parser with the given comment intron/exon pair, with a custom regex.

        Usually, you should use the #Parser(String, String) constructor, unless there are some special rules for how comment blocks are parsed.

    • Method Detail

                           Parser.ChunkHandler body,

        Given an input string, parses out the body sections from the tag sections.
        Specified by:
        bodyAndTags in class Parser
        Parameters:
        rawInput - the raw input string
        body - called for every chunk of text outside a tag
        tag - called for every chunk of text inside a tag
